string-array.name: asNonsenseNouns
string-array.item: an ISO standard cup of tea
the Knighthood of the Lambda Calculus

string-array.name: asNonsensePhrases
string-array.item: at the height of the Great Depression
for the love of the game
in the blink of an eye
in the midst of everything else
into the belly of the whale
like kicking dead whales down the beach
like nailing jelly to a tree
to the ends of the Earth
which is left as an exercise for the reader
with all the time in the world
without a care in the world
without regard for precedent or propriety
